author: James Joyce
text: Dear Mr Budgen: Thanks for letter. I translated it and sent it on to Mr Battona and hope it will soon appear in Il Secolo, I send you registered Mr Lewis’s Tarr. When you have read it please let me know as I have still to read it myself and write to him about it. I hope you will be free some evening to come here and have a chat about it. Enclosed a few press notices of my book which may interest you. Sincerely yours James Joyce
